title: Discovering color. - Rev. ed.
creator_credit: Columbia Broadcasing System, Paul Burnford and Jack Stoops
brief_description: Discusses differences in color in terms of hue, value, and intensity. Demonstrates techniques of color-mixing and explores the variety of color seen daily in the world around us. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Columbia Broadcasing System, Paul Burnford and Jack Stoops
